ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Re: High int.
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, not sure if 37 is ok for there or not either, but most of it would be blue/white around there I think.  Most of it is green (up to the pool room) to me
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, not sure if 37 is ok for there or not either, but most of it would be
blue/white around there I think. Most of it is green (up to the pool room)
to me at 54. There may be some hidden door with more blue, I think there
is, but to me the only blues I found was past the pool room (the big open
room with the port to CS).

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: S. Rutkowski [mailto:srutkowski@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 5:34 PM
To: eqenchanters@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: High int.


What level were you though? Most of the stuff in Skyshrine are VERY
hard for their level. At 37 I'm not sure how well you'd do there...

Stats you listed are for the Guardian Robe- and it is nice =) (but
ugly as sin - pink and dakrer blue)

Other robe is the Sentry Robe (+11 AC +5 Str +5 Dex +9 Int +20 Mana )

I was wrong below- the robe I should have listed in Charasis is the
Siren Scale Robe (+10 AC +10 Int +10 vsMg +10vsCold)

There is a couple of robes in the Crystal Caverns that attainable at
that level (and very nice). Blackened Crystalline Robe (+8 AC +6 Int
+5 Cha +10 vsCold) is the easier and looks like the PoF Necro robe.
the harder one comes off the Queen, and is called the Crystalline
Robes (+10 AC +2 Agi +6 Int +5 vsMg +10 vsCold +10 Mana). Both very
nice.

Course, the Sarnak Arcane Fetish is a fairly common drop, so it wont
be too expensive, and the robes I listed below are fairly easy to get
in trade items once the other people upgrade. Lots of SMRs and FBCRs
available for pp (although SMRs are still somewhat pricey due to the
fact they are used in several epic quests).

/cheers
--- In eqenchanters@y..., "Nygaardr, FC3" <nygaardr@c...> wrote:
>
> If you can stand the looks there is a very nice robe in Skyshrine
cant
> remember if its the sentry or guardian I got mine after about 8
hours of
> helping my brothers group kill stuff. I have warmly faction there
and I
> would pull with slow to the group then blur. The robe is 12ac 8int
45mana 5
> stamina 8vs magic and cold or heat cant remember. weight 0.0 Also
its all
> classes and most races. Although it is no-drop.
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Steve Rutkowski [mailto:srutkowski@a...]

>
> Okay, but she's a level 37 chanter- so unless she has some friends
in
> high places, her chanter is an alt., or she's one heck of a trader,
> she's not going to have access to some of this stuff. In order
> to contribute to the raid as an enchanter, you need to be:
> -EBoots 44
> -Sarnak Arcain Fetish 46-50
> -Robe of the Foci 50-51 (if this is the HS robe- can't remember what
> it's called)
>
> The rest you should be able to get by fighting stuff your level or
> below. If this is how you normally play the game, here are some
> recommendations for alternate equipment:
> 1. Neck- Plat Saphire Necklace (7int 7str)
> 2. Head- Nightshade wreath (1ac 5int 5 wis)
> 3. Shoulders (embroidered black cape is a shoulder slot item, not
> back)- Mantle of Mirth (2 int 2 wis shoulder item from droga, can't
> remember the rest of the stats)
> 4. Back- Mystic Cloak (listed in shoulder slot) or Molten Cloak
> 5. Feet- Wolf Fur Slippers (just +mana, but no real upgrades until
> EBoots)
> 6. Robe- Should be able to have at least a Oracle. Dalnir, SMR,
FBCR,
> Robe of the Foci are all upgrades.
>
> Allurreena Skybender
> Beloved Flirt
> Random Pet owner
> Founding member of the League of Mindfekkers
> <clan of shadows>
> Tarew Marr
